title: Seun Kuti & Egypt 80 Release 'A Long Way To The Beginning'
teaser: Seun Kuti, who is the son of Afrobeat star Fela, leads his late father's band. With their 3rd album, A Long Way to the Beginning, Kuti says he and the band have finally perfected their Afrobeat sound.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
